description: Observation to Hackney Council - Minor material amendment (under Section 73 of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990) to planning permission 2015/1834 for demolition of existing buildings on the site and construction of a part twenty two storey (Block A: Ground plus twenty one floors) and part four storey (Block B: Ground plus three floors) building for use as a 318 room hotel (20,600 sqm GIA use Class C1 including health and leisure facilities); flexible uses including retail, bar and restaurant, art gallery and art cinema (3,159 sqm GIA Use Class A1/ A3/ A4/ D1 and D2); private members club/hotel use (779 sqm GIA sui generis/ Class C1); Offices (5,807 sqm GIA use Class B1); and public bar and restaurant (646 sqm GIA Use Class A3/ A4); together with ancillary hard and soft landscaping, revised vehicular access/ egress, 218 cycle spaces, 6 disabled vehicular spaces, refuse/ service arrangements, and all other works associated with the development (accompanied by an Environmental Statement).
